message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more than your initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still looking to stay within my budget of $12,000. Would you be able to consider this amount?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $12,000 is really my absolute lowest.  If you're willing to meet me there, we have a deal.
